authors: Messina G, Damia E, Fanti L, Atterrato MT, Celauro E, Mariotti FR, Accardo MC, Walther M, Vernì F, Picchioni D, Moschetti R, Caizzi R, Piacentini L, Cenci G, Giordano E, Dimitri P. 2014.
title: Yeti, an essential Drosophila melanogaster gene, encodes a protein required for chromatin organization.
